=== Ubuntu Canada Team Meetings ===

<<BR>>

Ubuntu-ca meetings are held in Internet Relay Chat (IRC).  

Point your IRC client to <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-#ubuntu-ca]]</nowiki>; if you don't have an IRC client you can use the Freenode Webchat at <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-ca]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[https://www.google.com/calendar/htmlembed?src=mll58frmllrllfksgd12t3h7cs@group.calendar.google.com&ctz=America/New_York&wkst=1|Google Calendar of Meetings]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://www.google.com/calendar/ical/mll58frmllrllfksgd12t3h7cs%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics|iCal]]</nowiki>)

View the <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-Meetings-Next|next meeting]]</nowiki> on its own page, or catch up on the <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-Meetings-Previous|previous meeting]]</nowiki>.
